author: Stephen Leacock

content: Men know everything - all of them - all the time - no matter how stupid or inexperienced or arrogant or ignorant they are.
author: Andrea Dworkin

content: Old men are fond of giving good advice to console themselves for their inability to give bad examples.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

content: No longer shall I paint interiors with men reading and women knitting. I will paint living people who breathe and feel and suffer and love.
author: Edvard Munch

content: Few things are impracticable in themselves and it is for want of application, rather than of means, that men fail to succeed.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

content: There are a great many men valued in society who have nothing to recommend them but serviceable vices.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

content: As to the deceit perpetrated upon women, let it pass, for, when love is in the way, men and women as a general rule dupe each other.
author: Giacomo Casanova

content: Give me six lines written by the most honorable of men, and I will find an excuse in them to hang him.
author: Cardinal Richelieu

content: It disturbs me no more to find men base, unjust, or selfish than to see apes mischievous, wolves savage, or the vulture ravenous.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

content: An artist needn't be a clergyman or a churchwarden, but he certainly must have a warm heart for his fellow men.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

content: It is a clear truth that those who every day barter away other men's liberty will soon care little for their own.
author: James Otis

content: Much may be done in those little shreds and patches of time which every day produces, and which most men throw away.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

content: The only language men ever speak perfectly is the one they learn in babyhood, when no one can teach them anything!
author: Maria Montessori

content: Women, as they grow older, rely more and more on cosmetics. Men, as they grow older, rely more and more on a sense of humor.
author: George Jean Nathan

content: Only men who are not interested in women are interested in women's clothes. Men who like women never notice what they wear.
author: Anatole France

content: To judge from the notions expounded by theologians, one must conclude that God created most men simply with a view to crowding hell.
author: Marquis de Sade

content: We must make it clear that a platform of 'I hate gay men and women' is not a way to become president of the United States.
author: Jimmy Carter

content: As far as the men who are running for president are concerned, they aren't even people I would date.
author: Nora Ephron

content: Whatever women do, they must do twice as well as men to be half as good. Luckily, this is not difficult.
author: Charlotte Whitton

content: Ideas devour the ages as men are devoured by their passions. When man is cured, human nature will cure itself perhaps.
author: Honore de Balzac

content: Many men are deeply moved by the mere semblance of suffering in a woman they take the look of pain for a sign of constancy or of love.
author: Honore de Balzac

content: The same principles which at first view lead to skepticism, pursued to a certain point, bring men back to common sense.
author: George Berkeley

content: They died hard, those savage men - like wounded wolves at bay. They were filthy, and they were lousy, and they stunk. And I loved them.
author: Douglas MacArthur

content: Why is it that, as a culture, we are more comfortable seeing two men holding guns than holding hands?
author: Ernest Gaines

content: Reasonable men adapt to the world around them unreasonable men make the world adapt to them. The world is changed by unreasonable men.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

content: One can be a brother only in something. Where there is no tie that binds men, men are not united but merely lined up.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

content: Only the unknown frightens men. But once a man has faced the unknown, that terror becomes the known.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

content: The belief in a supernatural source of evil is not necessary men alone are quite capable of every wickedness.
author: Joseph Conrad

content: Girls have an unfair advantage over men: if they can't get what they want by being smart, they can get it by being dumb.
author: Yul Brynner

content: Our whole constitutional heritage rebels at the thought of giving government the power to control men's minds.
author: Thurgood Marshall

content: At every crossroads on the path that leads to the future, tradition has placed 10,000 men to guard the past.
author: Maurice Maeterlinck

content: There is frequently more to be learned from the unexpected questions of a child than the discourses of men.
author: John Locke

content: In a free society the state does not administer the affairs of men. It administers justice among men who conduct their own affairs.
author: Walter Lippmann

content: Only God Himself fully appreciates the influence of a Christian mother in the molding of character in her children.
author: Billy Graham

content: That strong mother doesn't tell her cub, Son, stay weak so the wolves can get you. She says, Toughen up, this is reality we are living in.
author: Lauryn Hill

content: It is not until you become a mother that your judgment slowly turns to compassion and understanding.
author: Erma Bombeck

content: My mother taught me about the power of inspiration and courage, and she did it with a strength and a passion that I wish could be bottled.
author: Carly Fiorina

content: It is only in the act of nursing that a woman realizes her motherhood in visible and tangible fashion it is a joy of every moment.
author: Honore de Balzac

content: Every man must define his identity against his mother. If he does not, he just falls back into her and is swallowed up.
author: Camille Paglia

content: The Vatican is against surrogate mothers. Good thing they didn't have that rule when Jesus was born.
author: Elayne Boosler

content: If there were no schools to take the children away from home part of the time, the insane asylums would be filled with mothers.
author: E. W. Howe

content: I wish my mother had left me something about how she felt growing up. I wish my grandmother had done the same. I wanted my girls to know me.
author: Carol Burnett

content: My mother taught me that we all have the power to achieve our dreams. What I lacked was the courage.
author: Clay Aiken

content: I basically became a cheerleader because I had a very strict mom. That was my way of being a bad girl.
author: Sandra Bullock

content: Mommy smoked but she didn't want us to. She saw smoke coming out of the barn one time, so we got whipped.
author: Loretta Lynn

content: I think while all mothers deal with feelings of guilt, working mothers are plagued by guilt on steroids!
author: Arianna Huffington

content: My mother worked in factories, worked as a domestic, worked in a restaurant, always had a second job.
author: Ed Bradley

content: The man in our society is the breadwinner the woman has enough to do as the homemaker, wife and mother.
author: Dorothy Fields

content: I stand fearlessly for small dogs, the American Flag, motherhood and the Bible. That's why people love me.
author: Art Linkletter

content: What motivated me? My mother. My mother was an immigrant woman, a peasant woman, struggled all her life, worked in the garment center.
author: Al Lewis

content: I'd go to, like, six different schools in one year. We were on welfare, and my mom never ever worked.
author: Eminem

content: One of the greatest titles in the world is parent, and one of the biggest blessings in the world is to have parents to call mom and dad.
author: Jim DeMint

content: I love those hockey moms. You know what they say the difference between a hockey mom and a pit bull is? Lipstick.
author: Sarah Palin

content: Don't let people disrespect you. My mom says don't open the door to the devil. Surround yourself with positive people.
author: Cuba Gooding, Jr.

content: My mom and I had the same vision, and we want the same things. We would always make a goal list every year.
author: Kim Kardashian

content: My mom took me to see Carnal Knowledge and The Wild Bunch and all these kind of movies when I was a kid.
author: Quentin Tarantino

content: I can only hope to be 10 percent of the mom mine was to me. She encouraged me to be confident and enjoy life. That's what I want for my son.
author: Charlize Theron

content: You know, I don't think any mother aims to be a single mom. I didn't wish for that, but it happened.
author: Charlize Theron

content: My mom decorated with lots of antiques. I never liked it when I was a little girl - I wanted to live in a modern house. But now I love it.
author: Paris Hilton

content: Looking back, I think I was always musical. My dad was very musical, and I think my mom was musical.
author: Paul McCartney

content: The person who has inspired me my whole life is my Mom, because she taught me commitment. She sacrificed.
author: Mike Krzyzewski

content: My mom is always telling me it takes a long time to get to the top, but a short time to get to the bottom.
author: Miley Cyrus

content: A Romney-Ryan administration will protect and strengthen Medicare, for my Mom's generation, for my generation, and for my kids and yours.
author: Paul Ryan

content: Thankfully, I have my mom and a small group of close friends who are there for me 24/7 and whom I can trust and depend on.
author: Christina Aguilera

content: I remember watching the Grammys and looking at the performances and crying to my mom, saying how much I wanted to be there.
author: Christina Aguilera

content: It is a sad commentary of our times when our young must seek advice and counsel from 'Dear Abby' instead of going to Mom and Dad.
author: Abigail Van Buren

content: My mom and I have always been there for each other. We had some tough times, but she was always there for me.
author: LeBron James

content: My mom, Irmelin, taught me the value of life. Her own life was saved by my grandmother during World War II.
author: Leonardo DiCaprio

content: I'm going to let people know that it's cool to have a child and be young and still be a good mom. It's really tough, but I'm doing it.
author: Brandy Norwood

content: I feel like a good mom. I'm a strong woman now... Don't look down on me. Pray for me because I'm trying.
author: Fantasia Barrino

content: My mom used to say that I became a fighter and a scrapper and a tough guy to protect who I am at my core.
author: Vin Diesel

content: My relationship with my mom is really the single most profound relationship that I've ever had in my life.
author: Mindy Kaling

content: Never play cards with a man called Doc. Never eat at a place called Mom's. Never sleep with a woman whose troubles are worse than your own.
author: Nelson Algren

content: My mom was a waitress, and my dad was a plumber who worked for the City of San Clemente fixing mains breaks, so not too glamorous.
author: Shaun White

content: I don't drink, and I don't smoke. It's a personal preference. My mom has never drunk or smoked. I look up to my mom.
author: Ashley Tisdale

content: When I was a little girl, rocking my little dolls, I remember thinking I would be the world's best mom, and so far I've done it.
author: Jenny McCarthy

content: I could do without 'cool' publications calling me 'mom jazz.' But I laughed all the way to the bank, baby.
author: Norah Jones

content: My mom just didn't put a very high premium on me being like really famous or really wealthy or anything.
author: Martha Plimpton

content: It's not common for a woman on television, especially if she's the mom of the family, to be funny. She's usually a straight man or foil.
author: Martha Plimpton

content: Isn't it so weird the day you wake up and you're just going with the flow? And you just suddenly are a mom.
author: Katherine Heigl

content: I'm a sappy mom now. I didn't think I would be. I thought I'd be a cool mom who keeps everything in perspective.
author: Katherine Heigl

content: My mom was always saying: 'Be whatever you want to be, but stick with it. Don't waver. Don't change who you are for anybody.'
author: Miranda Lambert

content: Being a singer is all about me. About ego. Being a mom is all about being selfless - two different worlds.
author: Gwen Stefani

content: I was born and raised in East Los Angeles by a single mom who had three biological kids and adopted four more. I never met my dad.
author: will.i.am

content: Mom and Pop were just a couple of kids when they got married. He was eighteen, she was sixteen and I was three.
author: Billie Holiday

content: My mom always said I was the peacemaker in the family. My older brother, Eric, was the leader, the creative one. I was just his puppet.
author: Gwen Stefani

content: My mom and dad met at Anaheim High School. After they got married, all they wanted to do was have four children, and they did.
author: Gwen Stefani

content: I wish I had an extra day with my mom sometimes. Or another hour in the day with my family, husband and children.
author: Mary J. Blige

content: In Hollywood, you play a mom, and the next thing you know, you're on 'The Golden Girls.' They age you so fast.
author: Gabrielle Union

content: So far I'm not surprised by anything about being a mom. It's all pretty great - but that's what I expected.
author: Charlize Theron

content: When I moved out of my mom's house at 18 I was almost as sad to leave her sewing machine behind as anything else.
author: Beth Ditto

content: If my Dad doesn't like you, you will know. My Mom is just too innocent to ever lie. She doesn't even cuss.
author: Channing Tatum

content: My mom, she wasn't like a baseball mother who knew everything about the game. She just wanted me to be happy with what I was doing.
author: David Ortiz

content: Mom was a smoker. My grandfather was a smoker. My aunts were smokers. My uncles were smokers. I don't know any smokers now, not even my mom.
author: Jane Smiley

content: My mom enlisted in the U.S. Navy in World War II, and my parents actually bought our home thanks to the loan she got through the GI Bill.
author: Thomas Friedman

content: It's her first grandchild, so she's really, really, really excited. I guess my mom is a little more stressed out than me.
author: Brandy Norwood

content: I really want to adopt a child... I want to be called 'Mom.' It really is the most beautiful word in the English language.
author: Patti Stanger

content: My guess is my brother would call his mom and his dad pretty regularly, a lot more than I probably did.
author: Jeb Bush

content: I am proud of my kids, but I also want to make my mom proud of me. I'm still a momma's girl at the heart of the situation.
author: Tori Spelling

content: Sometimes I do envision just being a stay at home mom but not working isn't an option for me currently.
author: Tori Spelling

content: There are days when I struggle with wanting to be a full-time, stay-at-home mom, and feeling guilty about that because I work.
author: Tori Spelling

content: I got my first tattoo when I was 16 years old and I went with my mom to get it done - she has a bunch too so we're tattoo buddies now.
author: Josh Hutcherson

content: My mom was a teacher - I have the greatest respect for the profession - we need great teachers - not poor or mediocre ones.
author: Condoleezza Rice

content: I lived with my mom in a really small apartment. My bedroom was like in the living room. That's why I still love to sleep on couches now.
author: Alicia Keys

content: In a school where everyone is famous or rich or whatever, you have a culture, 'What does your dad do?' 'What does your mom do?'
author: Cynthia Nixon

content: My mom passed away a day before high school started, and her dream was for me to be a full rock and roll guy, and play drums in a band.
author: Travis Barker

content: My mom was scared of the old Times Square so I was never allowed to go. Now I'm scared of the new Times Square, so I still never go.
author: Padma Lakshmi

content: When I was a new mom, I used to think that life was going to be balanced, and I strived for that. But life is crazy!
author: Brooke Burke

content: My mom was a ventriloquist and she always was throwing her voice. For ten years I thought the dog was telling me to kill my father.
author: Wendy Liebman

content: We never had a bathtub. Mom would bathe me in the wooden or tin washtub in the kitchen, or in a big lard can.
author: Ethel Waters

content: Mom was the greatest influence of my childhood. She wanted to save me from the vice, lust, and drinking that was all about me.
author: Ethel Waters

content: My mom used to have a lot of European cinema playing in the house, so I'd catch bits and pieces of films.
author: Mia Wasikowska

content: This is the place where anybody - like an African American kid raised by a single mom - can be president.
author: Jennifer M. Granholm

content: If I could be a third of the woman that my mom is and have a third of the strength that she has, then I will have done good by this life.
author: Brittany Murphy

content: For now I'm just enjoying being a mom. I don't want to be more famous and more rich. I want to be a good mom.
author: Jewel

content: My mom didn't want me to go to college. She didn't want me to read - when I read, I may as well have been holding a pineapple.
author: Lynda Barry

content: Mom and Pop were proud of my popularity, but from their point of view, show business was no way to make a living.
author: Ethel Merman

content: I have great faith that Heaven's there and I'll see my brothers and my mom and dad when I get there.
author: Ernie Harwell

content: I could never have pictured myself writing a book when I was 25 years old. My mom was an English teacher but I wasn't that way growing up.
author: Tony Dungy

content: I grew up in a predominantly Caucasian neighborhood, but my mom is Filipino-Spanish and my dad is Irish.
author: Shay Mitchell

content: My parents are wonderful, and I'm really lucky - but my mom has always been almost exclusively a right-brained person.
author: Brandon Boyd

content: Dad and mom would have preferred that I be a doctor, a lawyer, a scientist, or a great humanitarian.
author: Levon Helm

content: I think a good mom is an awake mom. At least for me, I've always been a kinder, better person awake than sleep-deprived!
author: Lisa Loeb

content: I gave guitar lessons. I tried to join bands. My mom always said it was obvious that nothing was going to stop me.
author: Janis Ian

content: My mom and my dad were married 56 years, and the fact that I reconciled with my dad I think made their marriage a little bit better as well.
author: Larry Elder

content: My mom said, 'Don't get married. You're too young. Go out there and experience what life has to offer.' And I did.
author: Emmitt Smith

content: I love my mom. I totally look up to her, and she just doesn't let anybody take advantage of me. People might call that a stage mom.
author: Hilary Duff

content: I'm a mom - I'm lucky if I get to shower in the morning. Luckily, nail polish stays on my toes. I've been so bad on the upkeep, though.
author: Idina Menzel

content: My mom's the one I look up to for everything. I feel like I'm a lump of clay and she's moulding me into a woman.
author: Chloe Moretz

content: My mom has always said that if I get a big head, she'll take me out of this business as quickly as I got into it.
author: Chloe Moretz

content: I just got my phone back yesterday. My mom had it for two days. I was supposed to read a book and I really wanted to play Call Of Duty.
author: Chloe Moretz

content: The problem with me is, anything that's easy I will just overdo it. Especially with clothes. But I'm 14 - my mom is super-strict about that.
author: Chloe Moretz

content: I think I've become more like my mom just because of what we're both interested in, children and teaching and writing.
author: Jenna Bush

content: I'm more like my father, personality-wise. But my mom and I get alone really well - obviously, because my mom and my dad get along so well.
author: Jenna Bush

content: My mom would take me to restaurants, and the first thing I'd ask for would be a pen and a napkin, and I'd sketch shoes and shoes and shoes.
author: Alexander Wang

content: I had such a great mom and I know that I'd never be that mom. I wouldn't want to bring a child into this world unless I could be.
author: Lara Flynn Boyle

content: My mom's been married three times my dad has been married a lot. I didn't really see my dad that much.
author: Skeet Ulrich

content: I want to make my music and be a happy woman, a good wife, a good mom and one day hopefully have a child of my own.
author: LeAnn Rimes

content: My dad is a very quick-witted, sarcastic, dry, humorous guy, whereas my mom's very silly, and that side of the family is very musical.
author: Tim Heidecker

content: My mom really instilled in me that I'm beautiful and I can do anything, and I echo that now with my own girls.
author: Jennie Garth

content: My mom was always the support. I can always go out to her and she'll always find the positive in things.
author: Caroline Wozniacki

content: Simon is cool. You know, it's different if you ever see him around his mom. He acts totally different.
author: Ruben Studdard

content: I want to make sure I continue to make good music that my mom and everybody around me can be proud of.
author: Ruben Studdard

content: I've never had my brows done - I tweeze them myself. I used to watch my mom pluck her brows, that's how I learned.
author: Emmy Rossum

content: My hero is Michelle Williams, who I grew close to when we did 'Meek's Cutoff.' She's an extraordinary actor and mom.
author: Zoe Kazan

content: When I look up and see a star, I know my mom is there. She's with me all the time. It's a powerful connection.
author: Emmanuelle Chriqui

content: My dad was a golden gloves boxer in the Marine Corps, then a deputy sheriff. My mom worked as an office assistant.
author: Susana Martinez

content: I want to go to college to study journalism. I want to speak French fluently, to travel. My mom was a journalist and it's in my blood.
author: Mandy Moore

content: My mom loved to sing - and I'll go on record and say she was the worst singer ever. I'd get up and move away from her!
author: Kenny Rogers

content: My daily schedule is quite hectic, but I have to put my health first in order to be the best mom and wife I can be.
author: Ellen Pompeo

content: I wanted to have a personal life that I fully inhabited, not because I am such a great mom, but for me.
author: Helen Hunt

content: When you're a mom and you have three children, nothing bothers you. Trust me. Who cares what people say? I've got other things to deal with.
author: Faith Hill

content: I saw things at an early age because my mom was a theater actress. I did a play with her when I was 10 years old.
author: Sam Rockwell

content: If I made a list of the people I admire, Mom would probably fill up half of it. She could do anything and everything.
author: Patsy Cline

content: My mom was always the supplier of soccer balls, and so people were always knocking on my door, and trying to get me out so we could play.
author: Freddy Adu

content: Being an only child, I didn't have any other family but my mom and dad really, since the rest of my family lived quite far away from London.
author: Tom Hardy

content: My mom, she's a breast cancer survivor and because of that I had started getting mammograms once a year, starting at age 30.
author: Kate Walsh

content: My mom always said that if the Protestants catch a Catholic in their church, they feed them to the Jews.
author: Kate O'Brien

content: I deal with postpartum feelings by reaching out to mom friends. I became very close with some of the women in my prenatal yoga class.
author: Alyssa Milano

content: When I was a kid and got in trouble, I'd always say, Mom, I'm in trouble. Well, Mom, I'm in trouble.
author: Earl Campbell

content: My mom, the fabulous Bertie Kinsey, is an amazing seamstress. She quilts and sews and is so crafty. We call her the Southern Martha Stewart!
author: Angela Kinsey

content: My mom, she's from Ireland, coached tennis in Nigeria when she was a missionary and turned me on to it when I was young.
author: Donal Logue

content: My mom was a source of strength.She showed me by example that women, regardless of how difficult life may get, can do it all.
author: Gloria Estefan

content: I remember my mom saying to me that what your friends do is one thing, but what you do could be on the front page of the paper.
author: Scott McClellan

content: My mom is in her mid-60s and has more energy and is more youthful than any human being I know. It's pretty incredible.
author: Oliver Hudson

content: My mom didn't ever think I would take to acting because I was a very shy, very reserved kind of child. But obviously, something changed!
author: Abigail Breslin

content: For a kid who's lost his mom and all the rage and grief that no one was able to talk out of me, football was a very therapeutic sport. Very.
author: Jon Hamm

content: When Queer Eye hit, the church told my mom they were praying for me. She said, God loves him too. And I support him 100 percent.
author: Jai Rodriguez

content: I had said to some pastor that I was having thoughts, and the church turned on me. They went to my mom and said, So sorry about your son.
author: Jai Rodriguez

content: I'd never really babysat. I feel like I'm Blair, or 'Gossip Girl.' A teenager, basically - and now suddenly I'm a mom?
author: Cecily von Ziegesar

content: I couldn't wait until I grew up. I used to look at my mom's stockings and put them on with her high heels and mess with my hair.
author: Florence Griffith Joyner

content: I wasn't always a writer. When I went to college and majored in fine arts, I was a painter. Then I was a stay-at-home mom.
author: Janet Evanovich

content: Dad worked his entire career as an aviation technician. Mom was a legal secretary who became a teacher. We lived a simple American life.
author: Brian Sandoval

content: My dad was a good athlete. My mom had longevity. There were some athletic genes that certainly got passed down.
author: Hale Irwin

content: I wasn't one to go out and buy a new car and stereo system and expensive clothes. My mom helped keep me grounded.
author: Christina Applegate

content: I was two years old when my mom put me in mommy and me classes. I always had a lot of energy so it was the perfect fit!
author: Aly Raisman

content: I still feel like a kid sometimes myself so hard to believe that I'm a mom. Now I'm an adult! It only took 38 years!
author: Ana Ortiz

content: I never thought I was a great mom. I always worked. I fell in love with my children as they got older.
author: Marla Gibbs

content: My mom just understands about stuff. We have a really good trust, and she knows I can take care of myself.
author: Balthazar Getty

content: I don't have to do a lot to my eyebrows. My mom always told me not to pluck them, which is great advice.
author: Arizona Muse

content: If you just stay away from junk, and stick with what your mom taught you, you're eating pretty healthy.
author: Sprague Grayden

content: I took piano for many years. I kicked and screamed through all of my lessons, but my mom really insisted.
author: Kristin Kreuk

content: My mom had gotten a Super 8 camera to make home movies with, and my brother and me got our hands on it and ran with it.
author: Lev Yilmaz

content: I never let anyone pluck, including myself, unless my mom approves. She guards my eyebrows. She's like the eyebrow police!
author: Isabelle Fuhrman

content: I was a big fan of 'The Smurfs' growing up, even though by default - my mom used to force me to watch because she was a 'Smurfs' fan.
author: Jayma Mays

content: I grew up with the classics. My mom and I would sit and watch 'Singin' in the Rain' and 'White Christmas' - those kind of movies.
author: Lucas Grabeel

content: My mom is a very warm, typical sort of Jewish-mother type. And my dad has a somewhat, um, different personality.
author: Peter Orszag

content: My mom had to beg the guys to let me play. I couldn't even play the drums right - Brian had to show me.
author: Dennis Wilson

content: For the first few years of my life my mom used to cut my hair so there were a lot of bowl-cut hair styles.
author: Ne-Yo

content: I think if I could be any superhero, it'd probably be my mom... but I don't think I'd look too good in high heels, so it's not gonna happen.
author: Jason Behr

content: When I can 10 or 11, my mom was the one out there catching passes for me. She was my prime receiver.
author: Joe Theismann

content: My mom was very strict when I was growing up. I could not talk to boys until I was 18. I had to study and work hard.
author: Coco Lee

content: I'm a mom, a full-time mom when I'm not taping. I do the carpool thing, and bake the cookies, and do the homework.
author: Vanna White

content: My mom was a photographer and whenever they needed a baby for a modelling job, she'd stick me in front of the camera. That's how it started.
author: Alyson Hannigan

content: My mom and dad are both in stand-up comedy, so that's where I started, that's where I got everything. My roots are holding the mic.
author: Pauly Shore

content: I'm not blaming my mom for my life because I am responsible for me, and nobody can change me or ruin me easier than I can.
author: Mindy McCready

content: I just started watching wrestling in 2008, and I've loved it ever since. I told my mom I wanted to become a wrestler.
author: Rico Rodriguez

content: For as long as I've been acting, I have been very lucky to be paired with really great actresses playing my mom.
author: Rico Rodriguez

content: I always had an interest in fashion because my mom is a celebrity fashion stylist. I grew up being on set or in showrooms.
author: Jasmine Tookes

content: My original inspiration was my mom: a few years after the death of my dad, she started dating one my teachers!
author: Meg Cabot

content: I spend so much time with my parents. My mom and I were joined at the hip for five years. There was not one moment when I wasn't with her.
author: Kay Panabaker

content: My mom still lives in Denver and some of my brothers are still in the area, so I still have strong ties there.
author: Terrell Davis

content: My mom was diagnosed with breast cancer when I was 13 and it was something we weren't really aware of as a family.
author: Rima Fakih

content: You eat and sleep it all day long and play on the streets until mom calls you in. My story is no different than anybody else's.
author: Adam Oates

content: I think I'm going to spend some time learning how to be a first-time mom, and then I'll go back to work.
author: Linda Cardellini

content: Growing up I always shopped at Victoria's Secret with my mom and saw Angels like Gisele and Karolina Kurkova in the windows.
author: Lindsay Ellingson

content: I'm a '70s mom, and my daughter is a '90s mom. I know a lot of women my age who are real computer freaks.
author: Florence Henderson

content: My mom taught me to go after my dreams. I have this faith in myself that I must have gotten from her.
author: Amy Jo Johnson

content: I love getting my nails done. My mom's best friend is a manicurist. When I was little, she'd do little paintings on my nails, like flowers.
author: Miranda Cosgrove

content: Anyone who knows me knows my mom, Dorcina, has to sign off on any decision and that she will play a major part in any decision.
author: Nerlens Noel

content: I love what I do and I think it shows. As my kids get older, they can see me as a mom who loves working.
author: Jessica Capshaw

content: At first I could not believe what I was reading. I got up from my seat and walked away, talking to myself that I may have found my mom.
author: Reese Hoffa

content: When I was young I thought that money was the most important thing in life now that I am old I know that it is.
author: Oscar Wilde

content: Money has never made man happy, nor will it, there is nothing in its nature to produce happiness. The more of it one has the more one wants.
author: Benjamin Franklin

content: He that is of the opinion money will do everything may well be suspected of doing everything for money.
author: Benjamin Franklin

content: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
author: Ayn Rand

content: Many people take no care of their money till they come nearly to the end of it, and others do just the same with their time.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

content: We go to school to learn to work hard for money. I write books and create products that teach people how to have money work hard for them.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

content: Money is a strange business. People who haven't got it aim it strongly. People who have are full of troubles.
author: Ayrton Senna

content: Money differs from an automobile or mistress in being equally important to those who have it and those who do not.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

content: Banks have a new image. Now you have 'a friend,' your friendly banker. If the banks are so friendly, how come they chain down the pens?
author: Alan King

content: Money is always there but the pockets change it is not in the same pockets after a change, and that is all there is to say about money.
author: Gertrude Stein

content: I am happy to make money. I want to make more money, make more music, eat Big Macs and drink Budweisers.
author: Kid Rock

content: All my life I knew that there was all the money you could want out there. All you have to do is go after it.
author: Curtis Carlson

content: If the money we donate helps one child or can ease the pain of one parent, those funds are well spent.
author: Carl Karcher

content: It is money, money, money! Not ideas, not principles, but money that reigns supreme in American politics.
author: Robert Byrd

content: Isn't it a shame that future generations can't be here to see all the wonderful things we're doing with their money?
author: Earl Wilson

content: Ben Franklin may have discovered electricity- but it is the man who invented the meter who made the money.
author: Earl Warren

content: It was an honor and privilege to arrive to this country 16 years ago with almost no money in my pocket. A lot has happened since then.
author: Antonio Banderas

content: If you make a living, if you earn your own money, you're free - however free one can be on this planet.
author: Theodore White

content: You know, a lot of people are just interested in, in building a company so they can make money and get out.
author: Arthur Rock

content: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
author: Lana Turner

content: The American Republic will endure until the day Congress discovers that it can bribe the public with the public's money.
author: Alexis de Tocqueville

content: Money isn't the most important thing in life, but it's reasonably close to oxygen on the 'gotta have it' scale.
author: Zig Ziglar

content: Too many people spend money they haven't earned to buy things they don't want to impress people they don't like.
author: Will Smith

content: What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
author: Bob Dylan

content: My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
author: Steve Jobs

content: I think the person who takes a job in order to live - that is to say, for the money - has turned himself into a slave.
author: Joseph Campbell

content: It is not the employer who pays the wages. Employers only handle the money. It is the customer who pays the wages.
author: Henry Ford

content: In general, the art of government consists of taking as much money as possible from one class of citizens to give to another.
author: Voltaire

content: Waste your money and you're only out of money, but waste your time and you've lost a part of your life.
author: Michael LeBoeuf

content: Money won't buy happiness, but it will pay the salaries of a large research staff to study the problem.
author: Bill Vaughan

content: Run for your life from any man who tells you that money is evil. That sentence is the leper's bell of an approaching looter.
author: Ayn Rand

content: God wants us to prosper financially, to have plenty of money, to fulfill the destiny He has laid out for us.
author: Joel Osteen

content: Don't matter how much money you got, there's only two kinds of people: there's saved people and there's lost people.
author: Bob Dylan

content: Good nature is worth more than knowledge, more than money, more than honor, to the persons who possess it.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

content: Modern poets talk against business, poor things, but all of us write for money. Beginners are subjected to trial by market.
author: Robert Frost

content: Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

content: To give real service you must add something which cannot be bought or measured with money, and that is sincerity and integrity.
author: Douglas Adams

content: Pretty much, Apple and Dell are the only ones in this industry making money. They make it by being Wal-Mart. We make it by innovation.
author: Steve Jobs

content: This will never be a civilized country until we spend more money for books than we do for chewing gum.
author: Elbert Hubbard

content: We need earmark reform, and when I'm President, I will go line by line to make sure that we are not spending money unwisely.
author: Barack Obama

content: Advertising is the art of convincing people to spend money they don't have for something they don't need.
author: Will Rogers

content: If you make any money, the government shoves you in the creek once a year with it in your pockets, and all that don't get wet you can keep.
author: Will Rogers

content: Let advertisers spend the same amount of money improving their product that they do on advertising and they wouldn't have to advertise it.
author: Will Rogers

content: The highest use of capital is not to make more money, but to make money do more for the betterment of life.
author: Henry Ford

content: I'd say it's been my biggest problem all my life... it's money. It takes a lot of money to make these dreams come true.
author: Walt Disney

content: Speculation is only a word covering the making of money out of the manipulation of prices, instead of supplying goods and services.
author: Henry Ford

content: Money doesn't make you happy. I now have $50 million but I was just as happy when I had $48 million.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

content: I don't believe we are supposed to go through life defeated and not having enough money to pay our bills or send our kids to college.
author: Joel Osteen

content: Money cannot buy peace of mind. It cannot heal ruptured relationships, or build meaning into a life that has none.
author: Richard M. DeVos

content: I'm tired of hearing about money, money, money, money, money. I just want to play the game, drink Pepsi, wear Reebok.
author: Shaquille O'Neal

content: If a person gets his attitude toward money straight, it will help straighten out almost every other area in his life.
author: Billy Graham

content: I don't blame the players today for the money. I blame the owners. They started it. They wanna give it to 'em? More power to 'em.
author: Yogi Berra

content: It's amazing how people will give when you don't ask. Many of them send money because they believe in the message.
author: Joel Osteen

content: Money was never a big motivation for me, except as a way to keep score. The real excitement is playing the game.
author: Donald Trump

content: I've seen the ticket, and I still can't believe it. When I see the money, I hope I don't hit the floor.
author: Judy Garland

content: I went to the bank and asked to borrow a cup of money. They said, 'What for?' I said, 'I'm going to buy some sugar.'
author: Steven Wright

content: I don't think the money people in Hollywood have ever thought I was normal, but I am dedicated to my work and that's what counts.
author: Angelina Jolie

content: Gambling with cards or dice or stocks is all one thing. It's getting money without giving an equivalent for it.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

content: The writer must earn money in order to be able to live and to write, but he must by no means live and write for the purpose of making money.
author: Karl Marx

content: You are your greatest asset. Put your time, effort and money into training, grooming, and encouraging your greatest asset.
author: Tom Hopkins

content: The big difference between sex for money and sex for free is that sex for money usually costs a lot less.
author: Brendan Behan

content: America believes in education: the average professor earns more money in a year than a professional athlete earns in a whole week.
author: Evan Esar

content: Because people have no thoughts to deal in, they deal cards, and try and win one another's money. Idiots!
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

content: Getting money is not all a man's business: to cultivate kindness is a valuable part of the business of life.
author: Samuel Johnson

content: It is easy to be independent when you've got money. But to be independent when you haven't got a thing, that's the Lord's test.
author: Mahalia Jackson

content: Writing is like prostitution. First you do it for love, and then for a few close friends, and then for money.
author: Moliere

content: The shortest period of time lies between the minute you put some money away for a rainy day and the unexpected arrival of rain.
author: Jane Bryant Quinn

content: Right now it's only a notion, but I think I can get the money to make it into a concept, and later turn it into an idea.
author: Woody Allen

content: A drunkard would not give money to sober people. He said they would only eat it, and buy clothes and send their children to school with it.
author: Samuel Butler

content: Success isn't measured by money or power or social rank. Success is measured by your discipline and inner peace.
author: Mike Ditka

content: The worst thing that can happen to a man is to lose his money, the next worst his health, the next worst his reputation.
author: Samuel Butler

content: It will be a great day when our schools have all the money they need, and our air force has to have a bake-sale to buy a bomber.
author: Robert Fulghum

content: People say that money is not the key to happiness, but I always figured if you have enough money, you can have a key made.
author: Joan Rivers

content: Money, it turned out, was exactly like sex, you thought of nothing else if you didn't have it and thought of other things if you did.
author: James A. Baldwin

content: Boxing is the only sport you can get your brain shook, your money took and your name in the undertaker book.
author: Joe Frazier

content: The darkest hour in any man's life is when he sits down to plan how to get money without earning it.
author: Horace Greeley

content: Our greatest lack is not money for any undertaking, but rather ideas, If the ideas are good, cash will somehow flow to where it is needed.
author: Robert H. Schuller

content: The three most important things a man has are, briefly, his private parts, his money, and his religious opinions.
author: Samuel Butler

content: It has been said that the love of money is the root of all evil. The want of money is so quite as truly.
author: Samuel Butler

content: I don't believe the most successful people are the ones who got the best grades, got into the best schools, or made the most money.
author: Ben Stein

content: I advise everybody not to save: spend your money. Most people save all their lives and leave it to somebody else. Money is to be enjoyed.
author: Hedy Lamarr

content: I'd like to be rich. I'd like a lot of money to put into my physicals and to buy food for all my friends.
author: Syd Barrett

content: One must beware of ministers who can do nothing without money, and those who want to do everything with money.
author: Indira Gandhi

content: Recommend virtue to your children it alone, not money, can make them happy. I speak from experience.
author: Ludwig van Beethoven

content: One of the evils of money is that it tempts us to look at it rather than at the things that it buys.
author: E. M. Forster

content: Knowledge is like money: to be of value it must circulate, and in circulating it can increase in quantity and, hopefully, in value.
author: Louis L'Amour

content: Bank failures are caused by depositors who don't deposit enough money to cover losses due to mismanagement.
author: Dan Quayle

content: Nothing induces me to read a novel except when I have to make money by writing about it. I detest them.
author: Virginia Woolf

content: Certainly there are things in life that money can't buy, but it's very funny - Did you ever try buying then without money?
author: Ogden Nash

content: If borrowing and spending all this money led to more jobs than we would be at full employment already.
author: Paul Ryan

content: An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. He must run with hope in his heart and dreams in his head.
author: Emil Zatopek

content: I'm not a driven businessman, but a driven artist. I never think about money. Beautiful things make money.
author: Lord Acton

content: The man whose only pleasure in life is making money, weighs less on the moral scale than an angleworm.
author: Josh Billings

content: Why should people go out and pay money to see bad films when they can stay at home and see bad television for nothing?
author: Samuel Goldwyn

content: Language is like money, without which specific relative values may well exist and be felt, but cannot be reduced to a common denominator.
author: George Santayana

content: I really don't like talking about money. All I can say is that the Good Lord must have wanted me to have it.
author: Larry Bird

content: I'm proud to pay taxes in the United States the only thing is, I could be just as proud for half the money.
author: Arthur Godfrey

content: Those whose life is long still strive for gain, and for all mortals all things take second place to money.
author: Sophocles

content: It's very important that every movie I do makes money because I want the people that had the faith in me to get their money back.
author: Quentin Tarantino

content: You lose your individuality a huge amount when you have no money, and I certainly had that experience.
author: J. K. Rowling

content: Neither soldiers nor money can defend a king but only friends won by good deeds, merit, and honesty.
author: Sallust

content: I haven't got as much money as some folks, but I've got as much impudence as any of them, and that's the next thing to money.
author: Josh Billings

content: Don't cling to fame. You're just borrowing it. It's like money. You're going to die, and somebody else is going to get it.
author: Sonny Bono

content: American men, as a group, seem to be interested in only two things, money and breasts. It seems a very narrow outlook.
author: Hedy Lamarr

content: It is a sad fact about our culture that a poet can earn much more money writing or talking about his art than he can by practicing it.
author: W. H. Auden

content: A moderate addiction to money may not always be hurtful but when taken in excess it is nearly always bad for the health.
author: Clarence Day

content: Well, the chairman of Federal Reserve just made his move to rescue Barack Obama. We're gonna have QE3. We're gonna print some more money.
author: Rush Limbaugh

content: If you don't want my God here, you don't want me here either. God has been too good to me to go and try to sell out to get some money.
author: Tyler Perry

content: Nowadays nothing but money counts: a fortune brings honors, friendships the poor man everywhere lies low.
author: Ovid

content: Anyone who wants to sell you overnight success or wealth is not interested in your success they are interested in your money.
author: Bo Bennett

content: But there are too many people that make so much money at the cost of lives of other humans and for no reason but to make the money.
author: Lily Tomlin

content: Thinking in its lower grades, is comparable to paper money, and in its higher forms it is a kind of poetry.
author: Havelock Ellis

content: Unfaithfulness in the keeping of an appointment is an act of clear dishonesty. You may as well borrow a person's money as his time.
author: Horace Mann

content: I think money is due for some sort of collapse. People are going to realize that money has a half-life, like radioactive elements.
author: Doug Coupland

content: Presidential leadership needn't always cost money. Look for low- and no-cost options. They can be surprisingly effective.
author: Donald Rumsfeld

content: It was Public Art, defined as art that is purchased by experts who are not spending their own personal money.
author: Dave Barry

content: Money is the seed of money, and the first guinea is sometimes more difficult to acquire than the second million.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

content: What I've learned is that you really don't need to be a celebrity or have money or have the paparazzi following you around to be famous.
author: Lady Gaga

content: Some artists are working to buy the mansion or whatever the element of fame must bear, but I spend all my money on my show.
author: Lady Gaga

content: The forties, seventies, and the nineties, when money was scarce, were great periods, when the art world retracted but it was also reborn.
author: Jerry Saltz

content: The people of this country, not special interest big money, should be the source of all political power.
author: Paul Wellstone

content: No woman marries for money they are all clever enough, before marrying a millionaire, to fall in love with him first.
author: Cesare Pavese

content: Making a movie requires 20 to 500 people to make and a lot of money and the stakes are a lot higher.
author: Alanis Morissette

content: Is it not odd that the only generous person I ever knew, who had money to be generous with, should be a stockbroker.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

content: A development deal is where they're giving you recording time and money to record, but not promising that they'll put an album out.
author: Taylor Swift

content: Money is the root of all evil, and yet it is such a useful root that we cannot get on without it any more than we can without potatoes.
author: Louisa May Alcott

content: And of course I didn't make any money from stand up for years, so I had temp jobs. That was the way I made money.
author: Demetri Martin

content: I pity the French Cinema because it has no money. I pity the American Cinema because it has no ideas.
author: Jean-Luc Godard

content: The only security men can have for their political liberty, consists in keeping their money in their own pockets.
author: Lysander Spooner

content: It can be liberating to get fired because you realize the world doesn't end. There's other ways to make money, better jobs.
author: Ron Livingston

content: I don't really care about money. I find money boring and accounting boring, so I'm probably not going to ever make a lot of money.
author: Juliana Hatfield

content: Divorce is one of the most financially traumatic things you can go through. Money spent on getting mad or getting even is money wasted.
author: Richard Wagner

content: We are going as fast as we can as soon as we can. We're in a race against time, until we run out of money.
author: Jack Nicholson

content: Money is such an amazing teacher: What you choose to do with your money shows whether you are truly powerful or powerless.
author: Suze Orman

content: I don't work very much, and I just sit here waiting for a script that I can't refuse - and I'm not talking about money.
author: Michael Caine

content: I decided I ought to pick a project that would not be controversial, that would not really cost the government a lot of money.
author: Barbara Bush

content: I had some money, I made the best paintings ever. I was completely reclusive, worked a lot, took a lot of drugs. I was awful to people.
author: Jean-Michel Basquiat

content: If you put all your strength and faith and vigor into a job and try to do the best you can, the money will come.
author: Lawrence Welk

content: Young film makers should learn how to deal with the money and learn how to deal with the power structure. Because it is like a battle.
author: Martin Scorsese

content: My body can't put anyone in jeopardy of not making money anymore - my body is just not on the table that way anymore.
author: Christina Aguilera

content: I turned down twelve films last year... Huge money films, but I had no respect for the writer or the work.
author: Shia LaBeouf

content: At this point I have enough money to live 25 lifetimes. You couldn't spend the money I've accrued now.
author: Shia LaBeouf

content: It takes no compromising to give people their rights. It takes no money to respect the individual. It takes no survey to remove repressions.
author: Harvey Milk

content: I like to sing ballads the way Eddie Fisher does and the way Perry Como does. But the way I'm singing now is what makes the money.
author: Elvis Presley

content: A rich man told me recently that a liberal is a man who tells other people what to do with their money.
author: Amiri Baraka

content: A corporation's primary goal is to make money. Government's primary role is to take a big chunk of that money and give it to others.
author: Larry Ellison

content: What white man can say I never stole his land or a penny of his money? Yet they say that I am a thief.
author: Sitting Bull

content: It's a sad fact about our culture that a poet can earn much more money writing or talking about his art than he can by practicing it.
author: W. H. Auden

content: I wanted to make a living, but I really was not interested in money at all. I was interested in being a great comedian.
author: Larry David

content: The extravagant expenditure of public money is an evil not to be measured by the value of that money to the people who are taxed for it.
author: Chester A. Arthur

content: The foundation of a financial fresh start actually has nothing to do with money or specific financial dos and don'ts.
author: Suze Orman

content: Nobody climbs mountains for scientific reasons. Science is used to raise money for the expeditions, but you really climb for the hell of it.
author: Edmund Hillary

content: Hussein has chosen to spend his money on building weapons of mass destruction and palaces for his cronies.
author: Madeleine Albright

content: Money isn't a major motivating force in my life. Nor is my profession. There are other things that I care more about than being an actor.
author: Kevin Costner

content: Billions are wasted on ineffective philanthropy. Philanthropy is decades behind business in applying rigorous thinking to the use of money.
author: Michael Porter

content: I grew up in a really small town with not a lot of money, and I liked singing, but it was just something that was a hobby.
author: Justin Bieber

content: The money that goes into Social Security is not the government's money. it's your money. You paid for it.
author: Mitch McConnell

content: Always remember, money isn't everything - but also remember to make a lot of it before talking such fool nonsense.
author: Earl Wilson

content: As Americans, we realize that there is no taxpayer money that wasn't first earned through the sweat and toil of one of our citizens.
author: Rick Perry

content: You have reached the pinnacle of success as soon as you become uninterested in money, compliments, or publicity.
author: Thomas Wolfe

content: Your goal should be to pay off your credit card bills in full at the end of each month and set aside money toward your emergency savings.
author: Suze Orman

content: Those carrying a credit card balance should scale back to making the minimum payment each month so they have more money to put into savings.
author: Suze Orman

content: The last thing family and friends want is for you to spend money on them that you don't have or that you can't really spare.
author: Suze Orman

content: To make the most of your money, I recommend sticking with mutual funds that don't charge a commission when you buy or sell.
author: Suze Orman

content: What we get from this adventure is just sheer joy. And joy is, after all, the end of life. We do not live to eat and make money.
author: George Leigh Mallory

content: The nice thing about the gallery shows is that without having to pay any money you can just go and see it.
author: Yoko Ono

content: Three groups spend other people's money: children, thieves, politicians. All three need supervision.
author: Dick Armey

content: First and foremost I am a drummer. After that, I'm other things... But I didn't play drums to make money.
author: Ringo Starr

content: People don't have fortunes left them in that style nowadays men have to work and women to marry for money. It's a dreadfully unjust world.
author: Louisa May Alcott

content: Banks are an almost irresistible attraction for that element of our society which seeks unearned money.
author: J. Edgar Hoover

content: Money is a good thing and it's obviously useful, but to work only for money or fame would never interest me.
author: Annie Lennox

content: The only thing I like more than my wife is my money, and I'm not about to lose that to her and her lawyers, that's for damn sure.
author: Jon Bon Jovi

content: Our American friends offer us money, arms, and advice. We take the money, we take the arms, and we decline the advice.
author: Moshe Dayan

content: You can spend the money on new housing for poor people and the homeless, or you can spend it on a football stadium or a golf course.
author: Jello Biafra

content: So, my happiness doesn't come from money or fame. My happiness comes from seeing life without struggle.
author: Nicki Minaj

content: I don't even know what sound is, much less what it's for. It isn't to make money that's for sure. I've never made any.
author: Don Van Vliet

content: To buy very good wine nowadays requires only money. To serve it to your guests is a sign of fatigue.
author: William F. Buckley, Jr.

content: I've been very well remunerated for my talents over the years so I really don't need the public's money.
author: George Michael

content: I find it fascinating that a lot of business books that do well are from people who've never made any money in business.
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

content: When I was in N.W.A. and didn't get paid all the money I was owed, that's when the business side of showbiz hit me.
author: Ice Cube

content: My story is the story of countless millions of children whose families and nations were torn apart for money in the name of Jesus Christ.
author: Sinead O'Connor

content: What saddens me is the corruption of youth and beauty, and the loss of soul, which is only replaced by money.
author: Lisa Bonet

content: Our public school system is our country's biggest and most inefficient monopoly, yet it keeps demanding more and more money.
author: Phyllis Schlafly

content: Let us face it: in the world today, money and economic strength remain more powerful arguments than the number of people you represent.
author: Guy Verhofstadt

content: I don't believe that I personally have been changed by the money. The bad thing is people assume you've changed because now you have money.
author: Shaquille O'Neal

content: People ask how can a Jewish kid from the Bronx do preppy clothes? Does it have to do with class and money? It has to do with dreams.
author: Ralph Lauren

content: Some people feel that what we're doing makes no sense, that it's just a waste of money. But it's working.
author: Calvin Klein

content: People don't have time to wait for somebody to paint their portraits anymore. The money is in photography.
author: Robert Mapplethorpe

content: Money isn't important, but you have to have enough, so you don't have to think about it. Thinking about money is a drag.
author: Jarvis Cocker

content: I went to the bank and proposed that they lend money to the poor people. The bankers almost fell over.
author: Muhammad Yunus

content: Qaddafi is hated because he is the leader of a small country that is rich, but he uses his money to finance liberation struggles.
author: Louis Farrakhan

content: In troubled times the last thing you want to do is to stick your money into a film. It's such a gamble.
author: Robert Carlyle

content: We pay for the mistakes of our ancestors, and it seems only fair that they should leave us the money to pay with.
author: Don Marquis

content: At the end of the day, money is just a proxy for votes. That is what makes politics so vulnerable to social media.
author: Sean Parker

content: Well, I thought the deal was, when you went to work for the government you weren't supposed to make money!
author: Joe Biden

content: My recollection is - and I'd have to confirm this - but I don't recall paying any money to go to law school.
author: Joe Biden

content: I couldn't relate to kid stuff. 'Jimmy doesn't like me!' Who cares? I was worried we didn't have gas money or food. Those were my concerns.
author: Leighton Meester

content: Research is four things: brains with which to think, eyes with which to see, machines with which to measure and, fourth, money.
author: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

content: I used to get my money at the end of the week, buy my mum something, or buy a record, and that was it.
author: Elton John

content: People look at me, and they go, 'You're white, you're smart, you must have went to college. You must have grown up with money.'
author: Adam Carolla

content: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
author: Marcus Aurelius

content: I wake up every morning at nine and grab for the morning paper. Then I look at the obituary page. If my name is not on it, I get up.
author: Benjamin Franklin

content: Thank God every morning when you get up that you have something to do that day, which must be done, whether you like it or not.
author: James Russell Lowell

content: I feel sorry for people who don't drink. They wake up in the morning and that's the best they're going to feel all day.
author: Dean Martin

content: Like music and art, love of nature is a common language that can transcend political or social boundaries.

content: Good nature is worth more than knowledge, more than money, more than honor, to the persons who possess it.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

content: No man should bring children into the world who is unwilling to persevere to the end in their nature and education.
author: Plato

content: Retaliation is related to nature and instinct, not to law. Law, by definition, cannot obey the same rules as nature.
author: Albert Camus

content: I was trying to do too many things at the same time, which is my nature. But I was enjoying it, and I still do enjoy it.
author: Jimi Hendrix

content: We are all full of weakness and errors let us mutually pardon each other our follies - it is the first law of nature.
author: Voltaire

content: It is the nature of truth in general, as of some ores in particular, to be richest when most superficial.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

content: Then not only custom, but also nature affirms that to do is more disgraceful than to suffer injustice, and that justice is equality.
author: Plato

content: Nature cannot be tricked or cheated. She will give up to you the object of your struggles only after you have paid her price.
author: Napoleon Hill

content: If the misery of the poor be caused not by the laws of nature, but by our institutions, great is our sin.
author: Charles Darwin

content: Man seeks to change the foods available in nature to suit his tastes, thereby putting an end to the very essence of life contained in them.
author: Sai Baba

content: All cartoon characters and fables must be exaggeration, caricatures. It is the very nature of fantasy and fable.
author: Walt Disney

content: To conceal anything from those to whom I am attached, is not in my nature. I can never close my lips where I have opened my heart.
author: Charles Dickens

content: Whatever the universal nature assigns to any man at any time is for the good of that man at that time.
author: Marcus Aurelius

content: I am in the habit of looking not so much to the nature of a gift as to the spirit in which it is offered.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

content: Dear God! how beauty varies in nature and art. In a woman the flesh must be like marble in a statue the marble must be like flesh.
author: Victor Hugo

content: Consistency is contrary to nature, contrary to life. The only completely consistent people are dead.
author: Aldous Huxley

content: According to the law of nature it is only fair that no one should become richer through damages and injuries suffered by another.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

content: To become an able and successful man in any profession, three things are necessary, nature, study and practice.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

content: There is a certain enthusiasm in liberty, that makes human nature rise above itself, in acts of bravery and heroism.
author: Alexander Hamilton

content: One of the first conditions of happiness is that the link between Man and Nature shall not be broken.
author: Leo Tolstoy

content: Love is a portion of the soul itself, and it is of the same nature as the celestial breathing of the atmosphere of paradise.
author: Victor Hugo

content: We must lay hold of the fact that economic laws are not made by nature. They are made by human beings.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

content: The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

content: To understand the nature of the people one must be a prince, and to understand the nature of the prince, one must be of the people.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

content: Nature has made a pebble and a female. The lapidary makes the diamond, and the lover makes the woman.
author: Victor Hugo

content: In the general course of human nature, A power over a man's subsistence amounts to a power over his will.
author: Alexander Hamilton

content: As a means of contrast with the sublime, the grotesque is, in our view, the richest source that nature can offer.
author: Victor Hugo

content: But such is the irresistable nature of truth, that all it asks, and all it wants is the liberty of appearing.
author: Thomas Paine

content: It is wrong to think that the task of physics is to find out how Nature is. Physics concerns what we say about Nature.
author: Niels Bohr

content: Nature that framed us of four elements, warring within our breasts for regiment, doth teach us all to have aspiring minds.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

content: A politician never forgets the precarious nature of elective life. We have never established a practice of tenure in public office.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

content: Revenge is a kind of wild justice, which the more a man's nature runs to, the more ought law to weed it out.
author: Francis Bacon

content: In nature, nothing is perfect and everything is perfect. Trees can be contorted, bent in weird ways, and they're still beautiful.
author: Alice Walker

content: For I have learned to look on nature, not as in the hour of thoughtless youth, but hearing oftentimes the still, sad music of humanity.
author: William Wordsworth

content: To insult someone we call him 'bestial. For deliberate cruelty and nature, 'human' might be the greater insult.
author: Isaac Asimov

content: Man's true nature being lost, everything becomes his nature as, his true good being lost, everything becomes his good.
author: Blaise Pascal

content: It is not in the nature of politics that the best men should be elected. The best men do not want to govern their fellowmen.
author: George MacDonald

content: What a book a devil's chaplain might write on the clumsy, wasteful, blundering, low, and horribly cruel work of nature!
author: Charles Darwin

content: Suffering by nature or chance never seems so painful as suffering inflicted on us by the arbitrary will of another.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

content: You have not found your place until all your faculties are roused, and your whole nature consents and approves of the work you are doing.
author: Orison Swett Marden

content: There is something beautiful about all scars of whatever nature. A scar means the hurt is over, the wound is closed and healed, done with.
author: Harry Crews

content: Complex, statistically improbable things are by their nature more difficult to explain than simple, statistically probable things.
author: Richard Dawkins

content: I also became close to nature, and am now able to appreciate the beauty with which this world is endowed.
author: James Dean

content: Our body is a machine for living. It is organized for that, it is its nature. Let life go on in it unhindered and let it defend itself.
author: Leo Tolstoy

content: Although our intellect always longs for clarity and certainty, our nature often finds uncertainty fascinating.
author: Karl Von Clausewitz

content: Ideas devour the ages as men are devoured by their passions. When man is cured, human nature will cure itself perhaps.
author: Honore de Balzac

content: The world is too much with us late and soon, getting and spending, we lay waste our powers: Little we see in Nature that is ours.
author: William Wordsworth

content: The machine does not isolate man from the great problems of nature but plunges him more deeply into them.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

content: Take a course in good water and air and in the eternal youth of Nature you may renew your own. Go quietly, alone no harm will befall you.
author: John Muir

content: There are grounds for cautious optimism that we may now be near the end ofthe search for the ultimate laws of nature.
author: Stephen Hawking

content: Nature is by and large to be found out of doors, a location where, it cannot be argued, there are never enough comfortable chairs.
author: Fran Lebowitz

content: The subtlety of nature is greater many times over than the subtlety of the senses and understanding.
author: Francis Bacon

content: I have always considered it as treason against the great republic of human nature, to make any man's virtues the means of deceiving him.
author: Samuel Johnson

content: The gross heathenism of civilization has generally destroyed nature, and poetry, and all that is spiritual.
author: John Muir

content: I'm not into organized religion. I'm into believing in a higher source of creation, realizing we're all just part of nature.
author: Neil Young

content: For a successful technology, reality must take precedence over public relations, for Nature cannot be fooled.

content: Nature is relentless and unchangeable, and it is indifferent as to whether its hidden reasons and actions are understandable to man or not.
author: Galileo Galilei

content: Habit is a second nature which prevents us from knowing the first, of which it has neither the cruelties nor the enchantments.
author: Marcel Proust

content: It was a Greek tragedy. Nixon was fulfilling his own nature. Once it started it could not end otherwise.
author: Henry A. Kissinger

content: What is a scientist after all? It is a curious man looking through a keyhole, the keyhole of nature, trying to know what's going on.
author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

content: The artist produces for the liberation of his soul. It is his nature to create as it is the nature of water to run down the hill.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

content: Of moral purpose I see no trace in Nature. That is an article of exclusively human manufacture and very much to our credit.
author: Thomas Huxley

content: I think politicians get hamstrung by the nature of politics when the private sector can really do great things.
author: Henry Rollins

content: I sit astride life like a bad rider on a horse. I only owe it to the horse's good nature that I am not thrown off at this very moment.

content: Art, as far as it is able, follows nature, as a pupil imitates his master thus your art must be, as it were, God's grandchild.
author: Dante Alighieri

content: Fear not, we are of the nature of the lion, and cannot descend to the destruction of mice and such small beasts.
author: Elizabeth I

content: Men have an extraordinarily erroneous opinion of their position in nature and the error is ineradicable.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

content: Men may change their climate, but they cannot change their nature. A man that goes out a fool cannot ride or sail himself into common sense.
author: Joseph Addison

content: I think that in today's world, by nature, we are all self-centered. And that often leads to selfishness.
author: Gary Chapman

content: By nature's kindly disposition most questions which it is beyond a man's power to answer do not occur to him at all.
author: George Santayana

content: To be perfectly just is an attribute of the divine nature to be so to the utmost of our abilities, is the glory of man.
author: Joseph Addison

content: I'm very competitive by nature. And I like to be the underdog - It's the best way to win. To come from behind and win is a great feeling!

content: Whenever nature leaves a hole in a person's mind, she generally plasters it over with a thick coat of self-conceit.

content: Natural gas is hemispheric. I like to call it hemispheric in nature because it is a product that we can find in our neighborhoods.
author: George W. Bush

content: The more intense the nature of a man, the more readily will he find meditation, and the more successfully will he practice it.
author: James Allen

content: Look, when you're the president, there's all kinds of things said about us. I mean, it's just the nature of the job.
author: George W. Bush

content: Man was nature's mistake she neglected to finish him and she has never ceased paying for her mistake.
author: Eric Hoffer

content: Nature is one great big wood-chipper. Sooner or later, everything shoots out the other end in a spray of blood, bones and hair.
author: Doug Coupland

content: My aim in painting has always been the most exact transcription possible of my most intimate impression of nature.
author: Edward Hopper

content: Painting will have to deal more fully and less obliquely with life and nature's phenomena before it can again become great.
author: Edward Hopper

content: Where there are large powers with little ambition... nature may be said to have fallen short of her purposes.
author: Jonathan Swift

content: I'm aware of the mystery around us, so I write about coincidences, premonitions, emotions, dreams, the power of nature, magic.
author: Isabel Allende

content: There's an easygoing nature that comes with a perspective of things that aren't as important as we make them sometimes.
author: Marguerite Moreau

content: Nature, when she invented, manufactured, and patented her authors, contrived to make critics out of the chips that were left.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

content: Good breeding is the result of good sense, some good nature, and a little self-denial for the sake of others.
author: Lord Chesterfield

content: Those who look for the laws of Nature as a support for their new works collaborate with the creator.

content: In athletics there's always been a willingness to cheat if it looks like you're not cheating. I think that's just a quirk of human nature.

content: I'm definitely a Polaroid camera girl. For me, what I'm really excited about is bringing back the artistry and the nature of Polaroid.
author: Lady Gaga

content: Support by United States rulers is rather in the nature of the support that the rope gives to a hanged man.

content: The elusive nature of love... it can be such a fleeting thing. You see it there and it's just fluttering and it's gone.
author: Mick Jagger

content: In this business you have to develop a thick skin, but I'm always going to feel everything. It's my nature.
author: Taylor Swift

content: Pure drawing is an abstraction. Drawing and colour are not distinct, everything in nature is coloured.

content: Doubtless there are things in nature which have not yet been seen. If an artist discovers them, he opens the way for his successors.
author: Paul Cezanne

content: We must not be content to memorize the beautiful formulas of our illustrious predecessors. Let us go out and study beautiful nature.
author: Paul Cezanne

content: Stupidity is something unshakable nothing attacks it without breaking itself against it it is of the nature of granite, hard and resistant.
author: Gustave Flaubert

content: As in nature, as in art, so in grace it is rough treatment that gives souls, as well as stones, their luster.

content: But I'm a hot-blooded Italian by nature. Whatever the situation you present, I'm going to make something out of it.

content: I am following Nature without being able to grasp her, I perhaps owe having become a painter to flowers.
author: Claude Monet

content: No author ever drew a character consistent to human nature, but he was forced to ascribe to it many inconsistencies.

content: It seems to be a law of nature that no man, unless he has some obvious physical deformity, ever is loth to sit for his portrait.

content: The addiction to sports, therefore, in a peculiar degree marks an arrested development in man's moral nature.
author: Thorstein Veblen

content: The protean nature of the computer is such that it can act like a machine or like a language to be shaped and exploited.
author: Alan Kay

content: People who don't see their nature and imagine they can practice thoughtlessness all the time are lairs and fools.

content: Your basic person wants to talk about material culture, internet culture. I think about God, cats, nature.

content: Part of making any endeavour is that each one has its own special problems. It's the nature of the process.

content: I have two children and it's amazing how in tune they are with nature, with light, with smells, with time.

content: That's all about the natural order of things, the idea of nature protecting children but also children protecting nature.

content: No tendency is quite so strong in human nature as the desire to lay down rules of conduct for other people.
